Game.Name: Toukyou Pachi-Slot Adventure (Japan) (Rev A)
Game.plot: Tokyo Pachi-Slot Adventure is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Color Dreams and published by Coconuts Japan,which was released in Japan in 1991.Cheat: Always WinDuring the game, select any slot machine, insert 3 coins, and, before pressing Down to run the slots, hold A + B + Select + Start. You'll always win the slots as a result.
